00023 
00024 void ObjectModelPlane::computeRandomModel (int &iterations, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, bool &isDegenerate,
00025                 bool &modelFound){
00026 
00027         std::vector<int> samples;
00028         std::vector<int> selection;
00029         getSamples(iterations,selection);
00030 
00031         if (selection.size () == 0){
00032                 isDegenerate = false;
00033                 modelFound = false;
00034                 return;
00035         } else {
00036 
00037                 isDegenerate = true;
00038 
00039         }
00040 
00041         if (!computeModelCoefficients (selection, model_coefficients)){
00042                 modelFound = false;
00043                 return;
00044         } else {
00045                 modelFound = true;
00046                 return;
00047         }
00048 }
00049 
00050 void ObjectModelPlane::getSamples(int &iterations, std::vector<int> &samples){
00051         assert(this->inputPointCloud!=NULL);
00052 //      points = inputPointCloud->getPointCloud();
00053 
00054         samples.resize (3);
00055         double trand = inputPointCloud->getSize() / (RAND_MAX + 1.0);
00056 
00057         int idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00058         // Get the index
00059         samples[0] = idx;
00060 
00061         // Get a second point which is different than the first
00062         do
00063         {
00064                 idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00065                 samples[1] = idx;
00066                 iterations++;
00067         } while (samples[1] == samples[0]);
00068         iterations--;
00069         // Get the values at the two points
00070         Eigen::Vector4d p0, p1, p2;
00071         // SSE friendly data check
00072         p1 = Eigen::Vector4d ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00073         p0 = Eigen::Vector4d ( (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00074 
00075         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00076         p1 -= p0;
00077 
00078         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2;
00079         int iter = 0;
00080         do
00081         {
00082                 // Get the third point, different from the first two
00083                 do
00084                 {
00085                         idx = (int)(rand () * trand);
00086                         samples[2] = idx;
00087                         iterations++;
00088                 } while ( (samples[2] == samples[1]) || (samples[2] == samples[0]) );
00089                 iterations--;
00090 
00091                 // SSE friendly data check
00092                 p2 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00093 
00094                 // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00095                 p2 -= p0;
00096 
00097 #ifdef EIGEN3
00098                 dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00099 #else
00100                 dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00101 #endif
00102                 ++iter;
00103                 if (iter > MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR )
00104                 {
00105                         cout<<"[SampleConsensusModelPlane::getSamples] WARNING: Could not select "
00106                                         "3 collinear points in"
00107                                         <<  MAX_ITERATIONS_COLLINEAR <<"iterations!";
00108                         break;
00109                 }
00110                 iterations++;
00111         }
00112         while ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) );
00113         iterations--;
00114 
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool ObjectModelPlane::computeModelCoefficients (const std::vector<int> &samples, Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients){
00118         assert (samples.size () == 3);
00119 
00120         Eigen::Vector4d p0, p1, p2;
00121         // SSE friendly data check
00122         p0 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[0]].getZ(), 0);
00123         p1 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[1]].getZ(), 0);
00124         p2 = Eigen::Vector4d ((*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getX(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getY(), (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[samples[2]].getZ(), 0);
00125 
00126         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p1 and p0
00127         p1 -= p0;
00128         // Compute the segment values (in 3d) between p2 and p0
00129         p2 -= p0;
00130 
00131         // Avoid some crashes by checking for collinearity here
00132 #ifdef EIGEN3
00133         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2 = p1.array () / p2.array();
00134 #else
00135         Eigen::Vector4d dy1dy2 = p1.cwise () / p2;
00136 #endif
00137         if ( (dy1dy2[0] == dy1dy2[1]) && (dy1dy2[2] == dy1dy2[1]) )          // Check for collinearity
00138                 return (false);
00139 
00140         // Compute the plane coefficients from the 3 given points in a straightforward manner
00141         // calculate the plane normal n = (p2-p1) x (p3-p1) = cross (p2-p1, p3-p1)
00142         model_coefficients.resize (4);
00143         model_coefficients[0] = p1[1] * p2[2] - p1[2] * p2[1];
00144         model_coefficients[1] = p1[2] * p2[0] - p1[0] * p2[2];
00145         model_coefficients[2] = p1[0] * p2[1] - p1[1] * p2[0];
00146         model_coefficients[3] = 0;
00147 
00148         // Normalize
00149         model_coefficients.normalize ();
00150 
00151         // ... + d = 0
00152         model_coefficients[3] = -1 * (model_coefficients.dot (p0));
00153 
00154         return (true);
00155 }

00157 
00158 void
00159 ObjectModelPlane::getDistancesToModel (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, std::vector<double> &distances)
00160 {
00161 
00162         assert(model_coefficients.size() == 4);
00163         distances.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00164 
00165         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the plane
00166         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00167         {
00168                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00169                 // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00170                 distances[i] = fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() +
00171                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() +
00172                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() +
00173                                 model_coefficients[3]);
00174         }
00175 }

00177 
00178 void
00179 ObjectModelPlane::selectWithinDistance (const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold, std::vector<int> &inliers)
00180 {
00181         assert(model_coefficients.size() == 4);
00182 
00183         int nr_p = 0;
00184         inliers.resize (this->inputPointCloud->getSize());
00185 
00186         // Iterate through the 3d points and calculate the distances from them to the plane
00187         for (size_t i = 0; i < this->inputPointCloud->getSize(); ++i)
00188         {
00189                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00190                 // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00191                 if (fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getX() +
00192                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getY() +
00193                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[i].getZ() +
00194                                 model_coefficients[3]) < threshold)
00195                 {
00196                         // Returns the indices of the points whose distances are smaller than the threshold
00197                         inliers[nr_p] = i;
00198                         nr_p++;
00199                 }
00200         }
00201         inliers.resize (nr_p);
00202 }

00204 
00205 void
00206 ObjectModelPlane::getInlierDistance (std::vector<int> &inliers, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients,  std::vector<double> &distances) {
00207         assert(model_coefficients.size() == 4);
00208 
00209         distances.resize (inliers.size());
00210 
00211         for (size_t i = 0; i < inliers.size (); ++i)
00212         {
00213                 // Calculate the distance from the point to the plane normal as the dot product
00214                 // D = (P-A).N/|N|
00215                 distances[i]=fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getX() +
00216                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getY() +
00217                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[inliers[i]].getZ() +
00218                                 model_coefficients[3]);
00219         }
00220 }

00223 bool
00224 ObjectModelPlane::doSamplesVerifyModel (const std::set<int> &indices, const Eigen::VectorXd &model_coefficients, double threshold)
00225 {
00226         assert(model_coefficients.size() == 4);
00227 
00228         for (std::set<int>::iterator it = indices.begin (); it != indices.end (); ++it)
00229                 if (fabs (model_coefficients[0] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getX() +
00230                                 model_coefficients[1] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getY() +
00231                                 model_coefficients[2] * (*inputPointCloud->getPointCloud())[*it].getZ() +
00232                                 model_coefficients[3]) > threshold)
00233                         return (false);
00234 
00235         return (true);
00236 }
